alert.note: Alert for Butler; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 2:10AM EST until February 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Woodbury affecting Warren and Butler Counties. Green River at Rochester affecting Muhlenberg, Butler and Ohio Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Woodbury. * WHEN...From this morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, KY 403 at James McKinney Bridge floods. Water overflows lock wall. At 30.0 feet, Several county roads flood near Woodbury. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 29.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
